channel.title: Comments on: Oracle Buying Open Source Companies?

item.title: By: Joseph Scott’s Blog » Blog Archive » Oracle Buys Sleepycat, Confirmed
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott’s Blog » Blog Archive » Oracle Buys Sleepycat, Confirmed
item.description: [...] Four days after commenting on Oracle’s purchasing rumors of three companies, one of them has been confirmed. Sleepycat was purchased by Oracle today. The official announcement has virtually no details other than to confirm the transaction. [...]
item.content:encoded: […] Four days after commenting on Oracle’s purchasing rumors of three companies, one of them has been confirmed. Sleepycat was purchased by Oracle today. The official announcement has virtually no details other than to confirm the transaction. […]
